test_utils module

Utility functions useful for testing

test_utils.are_blocks_equal(data_block_1: core.data_block.DataBlock, data_block_2: core.data_block.DataBlock)

return True is the blocks are equal

test_utils.create_random_text_file(file_path: str, file_size: int, prob_dist: core.prob_dist.ProbabilityDist)

creates a random text file at the given path

Parameters

  • file_path (str) – file path to which random data needs to be written

  • file_size (int) – The size of the random file to be generated

  • prob_dist (ProbabilityDist) – the distribution to use to generate the random data

test_utils.get_random_data_block(prob_dist: core.prob_dist.ProbabilityDist, size: int, seed: Optional[int] = None)

generates i.i.d random data from the given prob distribution

Parameters

  • prob_dist (ProbabilityDist) – input probability distribution

  • size (int) – size of the block to be returned

  • seed (int) – random seed used to generate the data

test_utils.try_file_lossless_compression(input_file_path: str, encoder: core.data_encoder_decoder.DataEncoder, decoder: core.data_encoder_decoder.DataDecoder, encode_block_size=1000)

try encoding the input file and check if it is lossless

Parameters

  • input_file_path (str) – input file path

  • encoder (DataEncoder) – encodr object

  • decoder (DataDecoder) – decoder objct

test_utils.try_lossless_compression(data_block: core.data_block.DataBlock, encoder: core.data_encoder_decoder.DataEncoder, decoder: core.data_encoder_decoder.DataDecoder) → Tuple[bool, int]

Encodes the data_block using data_compressor and returns True if the compression was lossless returns (True/False, size of the output block)
